attributes.action: Allow family & friends to Celebrate Christmas 5 days with strict rules Tier-4
attributes.additional_details: Last minute  Christmas cancellation by this Govt. has made millions of people feel unhappy, stressful and denying meeting loved ones.
attributes.background: Allow people to celebrate Christmas with immediate friends and family up to 2 families as everyone has planned for this to meet their loved ones during festival. This is the biggest celebration and government should allow with strictest rules so that spread of Covid19 is controlled.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reinstate the 5-day relaxation of COVID restrictions over Christmas: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564204

Allow families to have Christmas day together in all tiers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564312
